segments.text: I observe the scene in this bright kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window overlooks a serene garden with fences.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is drying a plate, towel in hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink is a disaster, water pouring out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's forming a slippery puddle on the tile floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is wet, yet she keeps working.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes wait on the counter to be put away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the boy climbs the stool boldly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's dipping into the cookie jar with glee.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool sways, threatening to topple.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister waits expectantly with open palm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're breaking the rules, sneaking treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The outside view is so calm and inviting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long until chaos ensues.
segments.speaker: PAR
